nodes.text: Brays was a captain in the Senate Building Security.

In 43.5 ABY, Jedi Knight Sothais Saar was in a meeting with Wynn Dorvan, personal assistant to Galactic Alliance Chief of State Natasi Daala, when Saar suddenly experienced the same psychosis other Jedi Knights were suffering from. Saar escaped from the Senate Building, where the meeting was held, despite Dorvan ordering a lockdown of the building and alerting Captain Brays of the situation.
